text: @PostRoz @gtconway3d @bethreinhard @emmersbrown @ReisThebault @bylenasun Bottom line is that 100 percent of all people are at risk for becoming ill with the COVID19 & no #GOP blocking of the morbidity & mortality data will cover up that brutal reality or change the numbers. Check the undertaker & unattended deaths data.  @FoxNews @CNN @SenateGOP
